import {css} from "emotion";
 
// import {unitMath} from "../../../../utils/css-utils";
 
export default function basicInvertedButton(buttonVars) {
 
  const {
    offWhite,
    basicInvertedBoxShadow,
    white,
    basicInvertedHoverBoxShadow,
    basicInvertedFocusBoxShadow,
    transparentWhite,
    basicInvertedDownBoxShadow,
    invertedTextColor,
    invertedTextShadow,
    basicInvertedActiveBoxShadow,
    strongTransparentWhite,
 
  } = buttonVars;
 
  return css`
    /* Standard Basic Inverted */
    & {
      background-color: transparent !important;
      color: ${offWhite} !important;
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedBoxShadow} !important;
    }
    &:hover {
      color: ${white} !important;
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedHoverBoxShadow} !important;
    }
    &:focus {
      color: ${white} !important;
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedFocusBoxShadow} !important;
    }
    &:active {
      background-color: ${transparentWhite} !important;
      color: ${white} !important;
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedDownBoxShadow} !important;
    }
    &.active {
      background-color: ${transparentWhite};
      color: ${invertedTextColor};
      text-shadow: ${invertedTextShadow};
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedActiveBoxShadow};
    }
    &.active:hover {
      background-color: ${strongTransparentWhite};
      box-shadow: ${basicInvertedHoverBoxShadow} !important;
    }
 
  `;
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
